p: Fructooligosaccharides (FOS), K 2HPO 4, CaCO 3, and DPPH were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich Fine Chemicals (St. Louis, MO, USA). Butanol, ethanol, trichloro acetic acid, FeSO 4, butylated hydroxytoluene (BHT) were products of Sigma-Aldrich (Steinheim, Germany). Hydrogen peroxide (H 2O 2), deoxyribose, thiobarbituric acid, MgSO 4 were from Amresco (Ohio, USA). Chloroform and methanol were from Univar (Downers Grove, IL, USA).
